name: burzum/Cart
description: Shopping Cart Plugin for CakePHP that will work with any table and make it's records buyable.

require.cakedc/migrations: If you want to use the database migrations that come with FileStorage

suggest.cakedc/Search: Required if you want to use the image processing feature of FileStorage
